title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte

Experience the transformative power of Julep's Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. This innovative product is a game-changer in your makeup routine, offering high pigmentation and a matte finish for a lasting, vibrant look. Available in a range of shades including Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic finishes, you can choose the perfect hue to complement your style.

The unique Crème-to-Powder formula ensures smooth application and a comfortable wear. This product is waterproof and crease-proof, making it perfect for all-day wear. The infusion of Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax not only provides antioxidant protection but also improves skin tone and texture, making it suitable for delicate sensitive skin.

Application is a breeze with the built-in smudger. Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and blend using the smudger or your fingers before the formula sets. No additional application tool is required, making it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups.

Choose from a variety of 30 shades, each providing high pigmentation, a matte finish, and a range of finishes including Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic. The formula is not only waterproof and crease-proof, but also provides numerous skin benefits. It hydrates and nourishes the skin, creating a protective barrier against environmental damage. The inclusion of Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax further enhances skin health, improving skin tone and texture.

Application is simple and straightforward. The product comes with a built-in smudger, allowing for easy blending before the formula sets. The blendable formula ensures a smooth, even application, and no additional application tool is required. The Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick is a must-have for anyone looking for high-quality, long-lasting eyeshadow that also benefits the skin.
